title: These regulations shall be applicable to the areas under Regional Plan (1) or Development Plan, as the case may be, sanctioned under the provisions of Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 (hereinafter referred to as ―the said Act‖)
clause_text: These regulations shall be applicable to the areas under Regional Plan (1) or Development Plan, as the case may be, sanctioned under the provisions of Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 (hereinafter referred to as ―the said Act‖).
